faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I register titles already distributed on other platforms?
faq.a1: Yes, you can. With a non-exclusive agreement, you can maintain existing distribution channels while also registering on MOFIC.
faq.q2: How does the content registration process work?
faq.a2: Our team handles the registration process directly. Publishers only need to provide files and metadata.
faq.a3: We use a global fund method similar to Kindle Unlimited. Plus, free credits provided by MOFIC to readers are also 100% settled, offering greater revenue opportunities.
faq.q4: What are the contract terms and termination conditions?
faq.a4: There is no minimum contract period, and you can terminate the contract anytime with one month's notice.
faq.a5: MG (Minimum Guarantee) is the minimum guaranteed amount. We guarantee ¥100,000/month for 100+ titles and ¥200,000/month for 1,000+ titles.
faq.q6: Are free promotion credits also settled?
faq.a6: Yes, free credits provided to readers by MOFIC are also 100% settled with publishers under the same terms as regular purchases.
